API¶

Stereo-seq Analysis By Python

Import stereopy as:

import stereo as st

io: reader¶

io module, reading matrix and transform to annotation data.

reader¶

io.read_stereo_data(path[, sep, bin_size, …])

transform stereo matrix into Anndata

io.read_10x_data(path[, prefix, gene_ex_only])

read 10x data

preprocess: pp¶

preprocess module

filter¶

preprocess.filter_cells(adata[, min_gene, …])

filter cells based on numbers of genes expressed .

preprocess.filter_genes(adata[, min_cell, …])

filter genes based on the numbers of cells.

preprocess.filter_coordinates(adata[, …])

filter cells based on the coordinates of cells.

normalize¶

preprocess.Normalizer(data[, method, …])

Normalizer of stereo.

preprocess.normalize_total(x, target_sum)

total count normalize the data to target_sum reads per cell, so that counts become comparable among cells.

preprocess.quantile_norm(x)

Normalize the columns of X to each have the same distribution.

qc¶

preprocess.cal_qc(andata)

calculate three qc index including the number of genes expressed in the count matrix, the total counts per cell and the percentage of counts in mitochondrial genes.

tools: tl¶

analysis tool module

Cell type annotation¶

tools.CellTypeAnno(adata[, ref_dir, cores, …])

predict bin-cells’s type

clustering¶

tools.Clustering(data[, method, outdir, …])

clustering bin-cell using nearest neighbor algorithm.

dimensionality reduce¶

tools.DimReduce(data[, method, n_pcs, …])

bin-cell dimensionality reduction

tools.pca(x, n_pcs)

the dim reduce function of PCA

tools.u_map(x, n_pcs[, n_neighbors, min_dist])

the dim reduce function of UMAP

tools.factor_analysis(x, n_pcs)

the dim reduce function of factor analysis

tools.low_variance(x[, threshold])

filter the features which have low variance between the samples.

tools.t_sne(x, n_pcs[, n_iter])

the dim reduce function of TSEN

find marker¶

tools.FindMarker(data, cluster[, …])

a tool for finding maker gene define a cluster as group, find statistical test different genes between one group and the others using t-test or wilcoxon_test

Spatial pattern score¶

tools.SpatialPatternScore(data[, method, name])

calculate spatial pattern score

Spatial lag¶

plots: pt¶

visualization module

quality control plots¶

plots.plot_spatial_distribution(adata[, …])

spatial bin-cell distribution.

plots.plot_genes_count(adata[, x, y, ncols])

quality control index distribution visualization

plots.plot_violin_distribution(adata)

violin plot showing quality control index distribution

analysis plots¶

plots.plot_dim_reduce(adata[, plot_key, …])

plot scatter of dimensionality reduction

plots.plot_spatial_cluster(adata[, …])

showing spatial bin-cell distribution after clustering

plots.plot_scatter(adata[, plot_key, …])

spatial bin-cell distribution.

plots.plot_marker_genes(adata[, groups, …])

marker gene scatter visualization

plots.plot_heatmap_marker_genes([adata, …])

marker gene heatmap.
